about_the_game:
This is a special pack that includes many items such as decor items and recovery items.
It also contains four deco items from the Tales of Series collaboration!

Obtained the following items:
　　S. Dymlos , S. Chaltier , Durandal , Soma



　　Katzburger , The Skewer , Pizza Cutter



　　Magic Cane , Magic Umbrella , Cuddlebear



　　Bladelord's Sword , Bladelord's Spear , Bladelord's Axe



　　Mr. Bladelord Mark , Ms. Bladelord Mark , Darius Mark ,
　　Charme Mark , M.O.A.V. Mark , Julette Mark ,
　　Acklao Mark , Satyus Mark , Balga Mark



　　Gold Coat , "Love" Mark




　　Demonite Ore × 9 , Muddied Silver × 18 ,
　　Soldier's Wisdom × 18 , Earthfang × 13 ,
　　Magistone × 10 , Bladetree Leaf × 3 ,
　　Vajrastone × 10 , Brutebeast Horn × 10 ,
　　Demon Bladewine × 3 , Manaform Eye × 10 ,
　　Blood Soul × 10 , Coolant × 48

　　Petit Potion × 20 , Lime Potion × 10 , Light Meds × 20 ,
　　Curapple × 10 , Coolberry × 10 , Remembanana × 10 ,
　　Melticot × 10 , Green Potion × 60 , Emerald Potion × 30 ,
　　Shining Pot × 30 , Skyblue Meds × 30 , Lapis Elixir × 15 ,
　　Demovita RE × 30 , Multiplum × 60 ,
　　Hero Curry × 5 , Omega Sandwich × 5 , Cubic Sugar × 5 ,
　　Bone Ramen × 5 , Ruinous Dish × 5 , Daemonburger × 5

TALES OF™Series ＆ ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.
©MUTSUMI INOMATA ©KOSUKE FUJISHIMA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core(TM) i3-4330
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core(TM) i3-4330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek high definition audio

short_description: This is a special pack that includes many items such as decor items and recovery items. It also contains four deco items from the "Tales of" series collaboration!
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
